---
title: Custom Templates
description: Under construction.
sidebar:
  order: 5
---

Technically Diploi can run any application stack that can be hosted on kubernetes
(so, practically anything). We want to give this power to our anyone using Diploi and are working
on this but we cannot promise any release date just yet.

**Missing your favourite stack?**  
Write us a message at [info@diploi.com](mailto:info@diploi.com), we'd love to hear what you think is missing.

**Need a Custom Template right now?**  
Please contact us at [info@diploi.com](mailto:info@diploi.com), we might be able to build one for you.
